page.title: 07RELIGION
page.content: {BRUNTON CHURCH}HAS BEEN CLOSED DOWN SINCE ROUND ABOUT{1950.}BECAUSE OF THIS THE{BRUNTON CHURCH}GOERS GO TO {CREICH CHURCH.CREICH CHURCH}IS NOW PART OF A BIGGER CHURCH AREA, {CREICH,FLISK}AND{KILMANY}.THE{MINISTER GOES TO{CREICH CHURCH}EVERY OTHER WEEK.THE TOTAL CONGREGATION IS ABOUT 250 PEOPLE.THERE USED TO BE A{BIBLE {CLASS}AND A{SUNDAY SCHOOL}.THE{BIBLE {CLASS}HAS STOPPED BUT THE{SUNDAY {SCHOOL}STILL CARRIES ON EACH WEEK.EACH YEAR AT{CHRISTMAS}THE{SUNDAY SCHOOL HOLDS A{PLAY}IN THE{CHURCH}ON THE SUNDAY NEAREST{CHRISTMAS.}MOST PEOPLE AT THE{SUNDAY SCHOOL}TAKE PART IN IT. {CREICH CHURCH }WAS BUILT IN{1832}AND HAS ONLY HAD MINOR REPAIRS TO THE INSIDE eg. LIGHTING OR ELECTRICITY.
